channel.title: Kat Purpy's Public Localhost
channel.description: Recent content on Kat Purpy's Public Localhost

item.title: Deer god, Sun, no
item.description: Long time ago there was a civilization, like ours. Today the deer civilization is lucky. Because soon the Sun will evaluate their worthiness. Merge with the Sun and help the civilization to develop further!

item.title: Super Monkey Post Celebration Diet
item.description: Spiritual sequel to Super Monkey Bathtub Racing. Jump on platforms and help Monke become slim enough for the M00n. He’s too fat right now :(

item.title: IEOTBAHFBGIAOM. Episode 1.
item.description: Open it if you want to ascend

item.title: Super Monkey Bathtub Racing
item.description: Become a monkey and race against other animals in the jungles straight from 2000s!

item.title: Hello Background My Old Friend
item.description: The Truth about CSS filters and WebGL

item.title: Site update or How Not to Make Spicy Backgrounds That Abuse Your CPU and GPU
item.description: A short lesson on how to do things right.

item.title: Cats Love Heat
item.description: You are a ginger cat, you are cold, jump through many cold hazards and get warm.

item.title: Once upon a time when the Universe died
item.description:
Experimental sokoban with a twist in a long dead universe.
Find the universal peace and revive the Universe!

item.title: Pyutas
item.description: A short hardcore twin stick shooter with delicious retro look

item.title: JigCube
item.description: A really colorful abstract physics puzzle game inspired by The Incredible Machine
